fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2011
fields.description:
Brick Fiesta is the premier fan of LEGO event held in the great state of Texas. Since 2003 the idea of having a LEGO convention and exhibition has been the dream and ambition of several TexLUG members. With the opening of a LEGO store in Austin and the right people asking the right questions Brick Fiesta is coming soon. We are looking forward to years of continued success.

Brick Fiesta is proudly presented by the Texas LEGO User Group (TexLUG) and it’s various chapters.
fields.hotel_information:
Brick Fiesta's premiere event starts at a location that is both close to the airport and close to the LEGO store.

Parking is available at an additional lot located across from the hotel.

Be sure to book early to ensure you get your spot.

fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2012
fields.description:
Brick Fiesta is open to adults fans of LEGO (AFOLs) 18 and over, and younger with an accompanying adult. While younger enthusiasts are welcome to attend, the target audience for this convention is adults and teens.

There are two components to Brick Fiesta 2012:

Fan Event
Brick Fiesta will be July 4 – 8, 2012. It’s being held at the Westin Galleria Houston located inside the Galleria mall in Houston, Texas. Please get your membership and book your hotel room as soon as possible. Thanks.

Public Exhibition
Brick Fiesta 2012 will be open to the public on:
- Saturday, July 7, 2012 from 10:00am to 4:00pm
- Sunday, July 8, 2012 from 11:00am to 3:00pm
fields.hotel_information:
Brick Fiesta is graciously being hosted by Westin Galleria. Conveniently located in the Galleria Mall, the Westin is within easy walking distance of the Houston LEGO Store. We have negotiated a special rate for the hotel accommodations.

Our special rates are $112 per night (single) and $127 per night (double).

Please note that the deadline to reserve your room is June 11, 2012.

fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2018
fields.description:
We are pleased to announce that Brick Fiesta is taking place in San Antonio, Texas and will be held at the El Tropicano Hotel on the Riverwalk from 5 - 8 July 2018.

Brick Fiesta has a track record of providing family focused fun since 2011. We have held our event in various venues including the Omni Austin Hotel at South Park, The Westin Galleria Houston, Mesquite Convention Center, and DoubleTree by Hilton San Antonio Airport. We are a Texas nonprofit corporation providing a family friendly Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM) focus event revolving around LEGO®. The event is co-chaired and staffed by unpaid volunteers from the various LEGO® User Groups based around Texas.

The 4 day event starts on a Thursday morning, with convention attendees and their families delivering and setting up their various LEGO® creations. Saturday and Sunday for a few hours, the convention attendees show the public what they have been building, demonstrate various STEM focused concepts, coordinate LEGO® STEM activities (robotics, great ball contraptions, speed builds), and answer fan based LEGO® questions. The event concludes on Sunday evening with families and LEGO® fans checking out on Monday.
fields.hotel_information: We are pleased to announce that Brick Fiesta is taking place in San Antonio, Texas and will be held at the El Tropicano Hotel on the Riverwalk from 5 - 8 July 2018.

fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2017
fields.description:
Welcome to Brick Fiesta 2017, a LEGO Fan Convention.  Each year Brick Fiesta is hosted in one of the four major cities in Texas – Austin, Houston, Dallas, and San Antonio.  This year’s convention is hosted in Dallas by the Dallas Ft.Worth LEGO User Group, DFWLUG.

Brick Fiesta consists of two components, the convention for members and the public exhibition.

The convention for Members – Thursday thru Sunday
   Display creations and compete for best of your category
   Attend numerous workshops, presentations and lectures
   Lots of LEGO to play with
   Join in group constructions and group challenges
   Compete in small, medium, and large speed builds
   Compete in creative builds, blind builds, and in-the-bag builds
   Participate in LEGO set drafts
   Seed build competitions
   Buy rare and custom sets, and parts from various vendors

The free build space is accessible to both convention members and exhibition members. Something new and creative is sure to develop over the course of the weekend!

We encourage All-Access Members to stay at our host hotel, The Hampton Inn & Suites, which has offered us a special Brick Fiesta room rate.  Book now!

The convention for Public Exhibition – Saturday and Sunday
   See hundreds of LEGO creations
   Millions of LEGO pieces
   Lots of LEGO to play with
   Meet and talk with the builders
   Buy rare and custom LEGO parts and sets from various vendors
   View speed build competitions
   Meet your local LEGO User Group
   Pull back car races
fields.hotel_information:
The group rate code for reservations is “BFE” and is valid for hotel room reservations between June 29, 2017 and July 2, 2017.
Beginning June 10, 2017, rooms will only be available at regular rates, so book your rooms

on or before June 9 to take advantage of our group rate!
Note that the group code will not work online for reservations that begin or end outside of those dates.
The hotel phone number is: 972-329-3100
The address is:  1700 Rodeo Drive, Mesquite, Texas, 75149

fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2014
fields.description:
Brick Fiesta 2014 - the premier LEGO® fan event in Texas - is being held in San Antonio, Texas with public hours on July 5 from 10 AM to 4 PM and July 6 from 10 AM to 3 PM.  You will be able to purchase memberships at the door up to an hour before the public exhibition closes for that day. No strollers please.

Memberships now only available at the door.

Saturday or Sunday $20 for family memberships (4 people); $10 for individual memberships.

Available Saturday only $30 for 2 day (Saturday and Sunday) family memberships (4 people); $15 for 2 day individual memberships.

Kids under 6 are free.

To get an idea of what Brick Fiesta is like, check out our archive of past events and the 2013 show report in RailBricks magazine issue 14!
fields.hotel_information:
Hilton DoubleTree Airport
37 NE Loop 410
San Antonio, TX 78216

fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2013
fields.description:
Brick Fiesta is a four day unique LEGO celebration in Texas taking place July 4 – 7. Started 2011 in Austin, grew in size last year in Houston. We are expecting big things this year as we move to the Dallas area and use the Hampton Suites & Convention Center in Mesquite for this years event.

Please note that Brick Fiesta is an adult fan oriented event and any one under the age of 18 must have a parent or guardian present at ALL times. If you just want to see what it’s all about we recommend coming during our public exhibition.

Please take a moment to review the membership options for this year there are public exhibition hours if you would like just see all the incredible LEGO creations and talk with the builders as well as listen in on some interesting sessions. If you a huge fan of LEGO and would like to be more involved and attend all four days of the convention please check out our convention memberships.

If you are coming from out of town we highly suggest taking advantage of our Brick Fiesta hotel rate.

If you have a business that specializes in LEGO feel free to contact us about becoming a vendor or sponsor.
fields.hotel_information:
We have filled up our allotment of rooms at the Hampton Suites hotel, which is attached to the convention center.

We now have an agreement with the Holiday Inn Express that’s right across the street from the convention, if you can try to get a discounted room at the Hampton Suites, but here’s the information for the Holiday Inn Express.

Book your room here, and enter the code “BFF” (without the quotes) into the Group Code field on the left (it will show up after you click the Group Code link).  That BFF code will get you an $89 room.

During your stay if you want to check out the surround Dallas area there is much to see and do nearby.

If you’d still like to use the Hampton Suites Convention Center, even if you can’t get the discounted rate.

The Hampton Suites & Convention Center Mesquite is hotel attached to the convention center.

fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2016
fields.description:
A Celebration of LEGO® in Texas!
Brick Fiesta is a non-profit, fan-run, family friendly annual convention celebrating the love for everything LEGO®!  Brick Fiesta moves each year, among 4 major Texas cities, and this year Brick Fiesta 2016 will be celebrating LEGO in Houston.

There are 2 parts to Brick Fiesta; a 4 day Adult Fans of LEGO (AFOL) convention and a 2 day Public Exhibition welcoming LEGO fans of all ages.

Brick Fiesta provides an opportunity for AFOLs from all over the country to come together to share in their enthusiasm for all things LEGO.  At the private convention the fan community can:

Socialize, sharing tips, tricks, & building techniques
Attend lectures, workshops, & round table discussions
Participate in games, contests, & other activities
Display original LEGO creations (MOCs)
Compete in a special LEGO sponsored Celebrate Friends Building Competition
Shop a variety of vendors
At the 2 day Public Exhibition we welcome fans of all ages to:

View hundreds of unique, custom-built LEGO creations on display
Shop vendors selling a wide variety of current, retired, and custom LEGO sets, parts, and minifigs
Meet and talk with the model builders
Join in at the hands-on build and play area
Bring your camera – photography is encouraged!
Please mark your calendars for July 7 – July 10, 2016 at The Westin Galleria Houston.

Follow us on Facebook or Twitter for updates and check back here from time to time to see all that’s going on!

Brick Fiesta is a non-profit convention / exhibition run completely by volunteers from TexLUG (Texas Lego Users Group) who are enthusiastic about sharing their creations with the public.  Parking is free and you won’t find a better bargain for family entertainment!
fields.hotel_information:
Brick Fiesta 2016 will be held in the Westin Galleria.  With endless dining, shopping (including the LEGO store) and entertainment just steps away, your entire family is sure to have a wonderful time!

We have negotiated a special “Brick Fiesta” rate for our convention attendees.  This rate will be available spanning 2 days prior and 1 day after the event dates, subject to availability of guest rooms at the time of reservation.

Our special Brick Fiesta rates are:
$119 for a standard single or double guest room
$134 for a triple
$149 for a quad.
Rates do not include applicable state and local taxes.

fields.title: Brick Fiesta 2015
fields.description:
Brick Fiesta 2015 - the premier LEGO® fan event in Texas - is being held in Austin, Texas with public hours on July 25 from 10 AM to 4 PM and July 26 from 10 AM to 3 PM.  

To get an idea of what Brick Fiesta is like, check out our archive of past events and the 2013 show report in RailBricks magazine issue 14!
fields.hotel_information:
DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
6505 N Interstate 35 Frontage Rd
Austin, Texas, 78752

Reservations: 1-512-454-3737

Make sure to tell DoubleTree you are with "Brick Fiesta" to get your room at the discounted rate of $119 a night.
